pros: Professional with great work for young people

job_title: Head Basketball Coach in London, England
pros: Highly professional friendly atmosphere . Possibility to go further in career . Team building atmosphere too . All aspects of the organisation are covered in details .
cons: travel expenses should be reimbursed for part time coaches ,specially traveling with children to venues . To get there travel time has to be short as possible .so there is no solution to use cheap transport by buses , it takes to long and children become nervous before games .

job_title: Programmer Support Officer in London, England
pros: Fantastic charity doing great work in the needy schools and communities - had a great experience working with all the coaches and office staff.
